official_title: To provide an 8 percent pay increase for General Schedule employees within the Philadelphia-Wilington-Trenton PA-NJ-DE-MD Consolidation Metropolitan Statistical Area.

summary.text: Extends an eight percent interim geographic pay adjustment (as provided under the Federal Employees Pay Comparability Act of 1990 to General Schedule employees in certain high cost-of-living areas) to General Schedule employees in the Philadelphia-Wilmington-Trenton Consolidated Metropolitan Statistical Area in the States of Pennsylvania, Delaware, Maryland, and New Jersey.

titles.title: To provide an 8 percent pay increase for General Schedule employees within the Philadelphia-Wilington-Trenton PA-NJ-DE-MD Consolidation Metropolitan Statistical Area.
